description:
Mom worries that she doesn’t bring anything to the school’s bazaar, Bunji cries since he doesn’t get to buy a toy he wants, Bunji plays in the mud at the park washing away the dirt in an area meant for pets, and mom reminisces about the past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The bazaar is really a pain / Aggressive nursery school / I won`t do it again! / On my palm
バザーは大変 / どとーの保育園 / もうしません / てのひら
